modules.title: How to Assist PwD Respectfully
content: Treat PwD with dignity and patience.

modules.title: Dos and Don’ts
content: Do listen carefully to their needs.
Don’t ignore their responses or preferences.

modules.title: Emergency Handling
content: Stay calm and assess the situation.
Call for medical help if required.
Ensure the PwD is safe and comfortable.

modules.title: Communication Tips
content: Speak slowly and repeat if necessary.
